Uses of Package

  • Classes in <Unnamed> used by <Unnamed> 
    Class Description
    Enemy
    Represents an enemy which can be fought by the player Enemies hold a random item that will be given to the player if the player defeats it This enemy has no magical attacks and has a base damage of 5.
    EnemyDecorator
    Decorator class to add functionality to an Enemy Allows decorators to change the name and maximum HP of the enemy
    EnemyGenerator
    A singleton generator class to generate enemies defined by the EnemyList.txt file Enemies generated past level 1 are decorated with either a Warlock or Warrior and are decorated multiple times depending on the level (a Warrior decorated enemy is decorated with Warrior twice on level 3 and three times on level 4)
    Entity
    Abstract class to describe an Entity with a name, maximum HP, HP, and is able to attack, as well as take damage
    Hero
    Represents the player which has the ability to move around the map and attack enemies with physical and magical attacks.
    Item
    Represents an item that a Hero or an Enemy can hold in their inventory
    ItemGenerator
    Singleton Generator to create items at random The items to be selected are read in from a file called ItemList.txt
    Magical
    Used to implement an entity that can use Magical attacks Magical attacks include Magic Missile, Fireball, and Thunderclap
    Map
    Singleton class to represent a location system that allows for items, enemies, the player, and empty spaces to be located
